OOC- You should beat your boss' ass, and say 'No more long shifts.  I have a life outside working.'  Thats what you need to do.  And welcome back.

shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@...> wrote:OOC: Sorry all for not posting soon enough. I got stuck working 16 
hour shifts with only 8 hour turn-a-rounds.  I'm still suffering from 
sleep deprivation. Other than that,if you care, caffinate. I hear a 
Mt.Dew calling my name and a soft comforter yelling at me.  Have a 
good night all. Erhm day. which one is with the sun up huh? Nighty 
Night.
